article.headline: Hartford 60, Dartmouth 50
article.story: WEST HARTFORD, Conn. (AP) -- Alex Zimnickas scored 13 points and Bo Taylor added 12 points and 10 rebounds as Hartford beat Dartmouth 60-50 Saturday for its first win of the season. Hartford (1-3) took command in the first half, holding Dartmouth (0-5) to 15 percent shooting and taking a 31-13 lead into the break. The Hawks shot 52 percent in the half. Dartmouth scored the first points of the game to go up 2-0, but Hartford went on a 15-0 run and never trailed again. Taylor scored eight points in the half. The Big Green came back in the second half, pulling to within 52-45 with just under three minutes remaining, but the Hawks iced the game with free throws and a 3-pointer by Michael Turner. Jason Meyer led Dartmouth with a game-high 18 points. Johnathan Ball added 12 points for the Big Green.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
